Feed
====

This is the documentation of the FEED module that enables pain free 
RSS imports. 

Use `require( hop.feed )`


Example
-------

${ <span class="label label-info">example.js</span> }

```hopscript
${ doc.include( ROOT + "/example.js" ) }
```
